attributes.action: Revoke the passports of muslims going to fight in Syria and other countries .
attributes.additional_details:
Passports should be revoked for muslims going to Syria and other countries to fight for their religion.
These people will be an obvious threat to the people of the UK on their return and will be even more radicalised.
There will be far to many to be monitored and if this were possible the cost would be enourmous .
It is our human right to be safe from terrorism and it's supporters .
